description: In this course students apply the models, insights, and analytical techniques of economics to a specific topic or economic problem. Topics vary from year to year. May be repeated if topic is different. Offered periodically. Prerequisites: one of Economics 110-121 or permission of instructor.
name: Top: China's Economic Progress
notes: Students who have completed Econ 218 Econ Progress China will nor receive credit
towards the economics major for this course.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: one of Economics 110-121 or permission of instructor.
title: Topics in Economic Analysis
